entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Mentioned as a person who would be angry if someone younger than seventeen found a way to get over the Age Line.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Looking through the crowd to see what had become of Krum.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Mentioned as someone Ron is looking for.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Bustled up to his students and was talking about going back to the ship.

entities.name: poliakoff
entities.description: One of the other Durmstrang boys who asked for mulled wine.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Saw Krum shake his head as he pulled his furs back on.

relationships.description: Karkaroff snapped at Poliakoff for thinking he was offering him mulled wine.
Karkaroff asked Krum if he ate enough and offered to send for some mulled wine.
